params.amount: Amount of tokens to add to the vault.

returns._0: The amount of tokens that are in the vault from the provided token and wallet.

params.amount: Amount of tokens to remove to the vault.
params.guardianSignature: Signature of one of the wallet's guardians.                           In order to take tokens out of the vault, it needs to be                           signed by the owner + a guardian.

verifyTransaction(address,address,uint25.notice: Verifies that the transaction doesn't spend assets from the vault.

userdoc.notice: Laser guard module that locks assets of a Laser wallet for extra security.         It acts as a vault in the sense that the locked assets cannot be use unless the wallet's         owner (or authorized module) orders otherwise.
